ActCanadian Environmental Assessment Act, 2012
SubjectGrassy Mountain Coal Project in southwestern Alberta ** Extension **
PrecisOrder extending by additional 135 days, to November 15, 2021, the time limit for issuing a decision statement to Benga Mining Limited with respect to the GRASSY MOUNTAIN COAL PROJECT, in Alberta.
